text: A woman has given birth at more than 42, 000 feet with the help of her husband and the cabin crew after going into labour during a flight. Musuamba Michoukayembe, from the Democratic Republic of Congo, went into labour three hours into a flight from the Gabonese capital, Libreville, to Turkey's biggest city Istanbul. The 21 - year - old's husband, who is a doctor, and the cabin crew immediately began preparing for the birth, isolating an area at the back of the Turkish Airlines plane. Ms Michoukayembe gave birth to a healthy baby boy, named Bennel, some 42, 650 feet ( 13, 000 metres ) above the Republic of Niger in north - western Africa.
